scripts.publish-major: yarn build && node ./bin/publish.js major && npm login && cd client && npm publish && cd ../server && npm publish
scripts.publish-minor: yarn build && node ./bin/publish.js minor && npm login && cd client && npm publish && cd ../server && npm publish
scripts.publish-patch: yarn build && node ./bin/publish.js && npm login && cd client && npm publish && cd ../server && npm publish
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf client/node_modules client/dist && rm -rf server/node_modules server/dist
scripts.build-c: cd ./server/modules/selva && make clean && make && cp module.so ../binaries/darwin_x64/selva.so
scripts.build: yarn buildAstParser && yarn buildClient && mkdir -p server/dist/lua && cp client/dist/lua/update-schema.lua server/dist/lua/update-schema.lua && yarn buildServer
scripts.buildClient: cd client && yarn buildLua && yarn build
scripts.ncu: cd ../client && ncu -u && ncu -u && cd ../query-ast-parser && ncu -u && cd ../server && ncu -u && cd ../tools && ncu -u
